import React,{useState} from 'react' import './ExpensesFilter.css' const ExpensesFilter = (props) => { console.log('PROPS LAGI',props) const [ getOption, setGetOption ] = useState('') const dropwdownChangeHandler = (e) => { console.log('INI HANDLER OPTION',e.target.value) setGetOption(e.target.value) props.onChangeFilter(getOption) } return (
) } export default ExpensesFilter
